findSql.name: crmToSOMMigration.findVersionIdsOfOrderInSequence
findSql.label: Find Version IDs Of Order In Sequence

method.name: cwOnFinderSQLSel
method.script: select h.cwdocid from orb_version_header h, cworderitems i where i.toporderid = h.cworderid and i.itemid = h.cwdocid {[0] and h.cworderid = ?} order by i.instancekey
